view

Class CustomerView

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.CustomerView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @SessionScoped
 @Named(value="customerview")
public class CustomerView
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    View - CustomerView.java JSF userArea.xhtml using this to handle interaction with user. Bean scope is a SessionScoped. Named called by JSF is "customerview".
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
